lib/dapplerc_builder.js
'use strict'; var deasync = require('deasync'); var inquirer = require('inquirer'); module.exports = class DappleRCBuilder { static build() { var questions = [ { "type": "input", "name": "ipfs_host", "message": "What is the hostname you use to connect to IPFS?", "default": "localhost" }, { "type": "input", "name": "ipfs_port", "message": "What is the port you use to connect to IPFS?", "default": "4001" }, { "type": "input", "name": "eth_host", "message": "What hostname do you want web3 to use by default?", "default": "localhost" }, { "type": "input", "name": "eth_port", "message": "What port do you want web3 to use by default?", "default": "8545" } ]; var rc; var done = false; inquirer.prompt(questions, function(res) { rc = { eth: { host: res.eth_host, port: res.eth_port }, ipfs: { host: res.ipfs_host, port: res.ipfs_port } }; done = true; }); deasync.loopWhile(function() {return !done;}) return rc; } };
